Introduction

Chen Kuan Jui, or simply Rui, is a Chinese singer and member of the boy group XLOV. He is best known for being a contestant on the 2022 survival show, "Boys Planet."

On December 19, 2024, he was revealed as the second member of the upcoming boy group XLOV.
